General.Name: Micro Contact Solution Co. Ltd
General.Description: Micro Contact Solution Co., Ltd. offers solutions for semiconductor interconnect devices worldwide. It offers BGA, LGA, module, test, discrete, TSOP, SSD, and POGO PIN products, as well as other products, including ACS, memory card, and connector products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Cheonan, South Korea.
